description: Activists from various initiatives, including initiatives against the Amazon Tower, Mietenwahnsinnbündnis, #200Häuser spontaneously demonstrated in front of the construction site of the “Amazon East Side Edge Tower” at Warschauer Brücke. The protests are directed at Amazon's handling of the pandemic in several German Amazon centers. The company is responsible for the increase in infections and illnesses among workers and is allowing the Christmas shopping season to continue.
author: organizejs
addresses: Amazon, 8, Alt-Heiligensee, Heiligensee, Reinickendorf, Berlin, 13503, Deutschland
